changeSet.author: paritosh
changeSet.comment: Fix rules that update resource views
changeSet.sql: CREATE RULE update_views AS ON INSERT TO ${plog_schema}.logdata WHERE NEW.request_method = 'GET' DO UPDATE resources SET views = views + 1 WHERE id IN (SELECT parents.id FROM binds INNER JOIN resources parents ON binds.collection_id = parents.id INNER JOIN resources child ON child.id = binds.resource_id WHERE child.uuid = NEW.resource_uuid AND binds.name LIKE '%html')
